name: 3.8-beta7
body:
- performance improvements
- various bug fixes
- app-specific icon / text color settings

name: 3.8-beta6
body:
- updated / partially redesigned color picker
- add a "dark theme" option for the settings page
- fix "support forum" link at bottom of help page

name: 3.8-beta5
body:
- fixed background threading issue
- re-implemented notification preferences (now in the icons tab)
- added minimum priority/persistent notification settings
- other random bug fixes

name: 3.8-beta4
body:
- redesigned application-specific settings (#146)
- fixed UI bugs in icon settings
- memory usage improvements (#145)

name: 3.8-beta3
body:
- fixed vague animator-related issue
- redesigned icon settings (#115)
- added text and icon offset preferences (#132)

name: 3.8-beta
body:
This is a beta version. Lots of changes have been made. Lots of settings and functionality has been removed to allow for these changes. Things will be missing, and other things may not work. That said, the core functionality is much faster and has been improved quite a bit.

- battery life has been improved (fewer services)
- faster response time
- changing settings no longer requires the entire status bar to restart
- icons have two color settings - one for light backgrounds & one for dark
- default colors / icon contrast settings are more intuitive
- "transparent mode" adds alpha channel to color pickers

- improved permissions system
- fixed help/FAQ section
- improved app/activity setting design
- arabic translations by @Alsidi-Group
- fixed fonts
- other random bug fixes/improvements

- Korean and Chinese translations (thanks to Kim Inseop and Majida Whale)
- added option to prevent icon overlapping
- fixed a small issue with burn-in protection
- added a somewhat useless "transparent mode" setting
- improved the accessibility service description

- added an option to add padding to the entire status bar for phones with rounded screen corners
- a couple new icon styles
- improved icon style creation UI
- options to change text font & style
- added a 'camera bump' mode because why not
- ability to change the status bar height, idk why anyone would need this but it's there I guess
- squashed a bug: notifications stop working, cause: images take up too much memory
- probably made a couple performance improvements and all that

- fixed a bug occurring on Android M and higher
- improved home screen color logic
- added 'burn-in protection' option
- improved the persistent notification
- added Spanish translations (thanks @Ryo567)

Important: Status will not be supported on versions after Android O. See issue #87.

- fixed a bug or two

Please note that this update will delete any backups you have created in the previous version. Your current settings will not be affected.

- added option to change text color individually
- added outlines to color views
- fixed a few crashes

- less intrusive tutorials
- added a 'backup/restore' preference
- added a persistent notification to prevent some minor issues (can be disabled in settings)
- fixed memory leaks
- added support for Android O (probably)

- fixed random UI bugs
- improved in-app search bar
- prevented issues with the signal icon(s)
- added more icon styles by @Technologx

This is not a big release
But the notification bugs will cease
New icons have been added
Existing ones should be more padded
Internal workings have been greased
Battery usage should be at peace
The color scheme has just been changed
It almost seems prearranged

- fixed network icon bugs
- minor design changes

- fixed bugs with the battery icon
- added new icon styles
- create custom icon styles from images in the gallery
- added better color suggestions
- small UI changes

- prevented a few crashes
- improved color animations
- minor design changes

- made a few design changes
- small performance improvements
- added a stock battery icon (makes it sound easier than it actually is)
- added different heads up styles
- added alignment options
- fixed bugs

- moved the tutorial from a separate screen to in-app popups
- added a GPS icon
- improved date formatting options
- added a way to re-order icons
- added a FAQ section
- fixed a bunch of bugs

- fixed the battery percent option (again)
- added NFC and headphones status indicator
- improved animations
- added an option to turn off animations
- improved a few descriptions
- added a setting to tint the icons with the primary color

- fixed a bug in the permissions screen
- fixed the battery percent option (again)

Side-note: Unfortunately, school has just started for me and most of the people that were helping me with this project, so the amount of time I have to work on this app has significantly decreased. TL/DR: updates will be slower. Sorry.

- added a nice tutorial :D
- fixed a problem with the permissions request system
- you can now pick a color from an image in the color picker
- re-implemented the battery percent & date options (removed in the previous update)

Side-note: Unfortunately, school has just started for me and most of the people that were helping me with this project, so the amount of time I have to work on this app has significantly decreased. TL/DR: updates will be slower. Sorry.

- fixed a couple bugs in the automatic color picking thingy
- somewhat redesigned the settings UI
- fixed two random bugs in the setup screen
- added an option to center icons
- added a setting to disable notification icons for specific apps

- improved color accuracy
- colors can now be changed for individual screens (instead of the whole application)
- added an (optional) prompt to set the color for a screen if the app cannot find one
- added preset colors to the color picker, as well as a couple animations and a 'reset' button
- added heads up notifications
- fixed the 24 hour clock format on a couple devices
- fixed a potential bug in the icon styling options

- fixed a couple bugs
- fixed a couple more bugs
- fixed even more bugs
- I also fixed some bugs
- there were a couple bugs that I fixed as well
- working on a dual sim option, it might take a while
- bug fix updates are boring

The bugs have been crunched
Just like my bagel was munched
The intro screen was redesigned
The color preference is now aligned
I made the status bar transparent (only on the home screen though)
The setting should be apparent
Vuk has made more icon styles
I had to manage all the files (okay, it wasn't THAT bad)
The apk size has been scrunched
And the release was bunched

:3

Changelog:
- added a data indicator
- fixed a crash on android 6.0 and above
- improved support for fullscreen mode
- added some more animations

- added icon styles
- more support for fullscreen mode
- fixed a crash on the permissions screen below android 4.3
- many more settings
- improved search algorithm
- added a ringer volume icon

Changelog:
- small bug fixes
